short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auloula helps you write faster and better, with real time autocomplete suggestions based on the context of the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Auloula - AI-Powered Form Autocomplete
A Chrome extension that uses GPT-4 to intelligently autocomplete form fields based on page context.

Features:
- 🤖 GPT-4 powered form field suggestions
- 🔍 Context-aware
- 🌐 Any language supported by GPT-4
- 🔒 Secure API key management
- 🎯 Site-specific controls
- ⚡ Fast and lightweight
- 🎭 Custom response name
